titles.title: Directing the Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to deliver the mace of the House of Representatives to the Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution for necessary repairs.

action.text: Mr. Boehner asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/27/2006--Passed House without amendment. Authorizes and directs the Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to deliver the mace of the House to the Secretary of the Smithsonian Institution for necessary repairs. Instructs that the mace be returned to the House before noon on the day before it next reconvenes pursuant to concurrent resolution or at any sooner time when so directed by the Speaker.
